main event: A witness observed a bright pulsating light that changed colors and moved at high speed on October 9, 1968, in State College, Mississippi.
interesting points: The light was larger than a normal aircraft and moved silently across the sky., The object was disc-shaped and approximately 50-60 feet in diameter., The witness described it as metallic and it hovered before accelerating out of sight., The sighting was noted to be different from previous instances that were identified as normal aircraft., The observer was a high school student with an engineering background, lending credibility to the sighting.
sighted object: a disc-shaped craft emitting a bright light
witness description: a high school student with an engineering background
